title: Running Officials Did Not Test Long-Shot New York City Marathon Winner Before Race
description: Sharon Lokedi won Sunday’s marathon in her debut at the distance. Because she was little known, she was not subjected to the prerace drug testing program.
dc:creator: Matthew Futterman
media:credit: Ben Solomon for The New York Times
media:description: Sharon Lokedi of Kenya won the women’s marathon in 2 hours 23 minutes 23 seconds.
